SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE A LEFT JOIN VIEWS B ON 1=1 AND B.CONTENTS_TYPE='NOTICE' AND B.CONTENTS_ID = A.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD_TAGS C ON 1=1 AND C.CONTENTS_TYPE='NOTICE' AND C.CONTENTS_ID = A.ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER D ON 1=1 AND D.MEM_ID = A.REG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%${search_keyword}%'
AND A.CONTENTS LIKE '%${search_keyword}%'
mapper.sql: SELECT A.ID ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENTS ,A.THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH ,A.REG_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DATE ,A.UPT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPT_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPT_DATE ,IFNULL(B.VIEW_CNT ,0) AS VIEW_CNT ,IFNULL(C.TAGS ,'') AS TAGS ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE 1=1 AND CONTENTS_TYPE='NOTICE' AND CONTENTS_ID = A.ID AND LIKE_TYPE = '01' AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' ) AS LIKE_CNT ,D.NICKNAME FROM NOTICE A LEFT JOIN VIEWS B ON 1=1 AND B.CONTENTS_TYPE='NOTICE' AND B.CONTENTS_ID = A.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD_TAGS C ON 1=1 AND C.CONTENTS_TYPE='NOTICE' AND C.CONTENTS_ID = A.ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER D ON 1=1 AND D.MEM_ID = A.REG_ID
